attributes.action: Put a temperature limit to stop work when the weather gets too hot.
attributes.additional_details: Coming from a trades perspective it gets too hot for manual labour and physically exhausts you in this heat.
attributes.background: Stop allowing people to work in 30degrees+

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Set a legal maximum temperature for all indoor workplaces
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588186

If you'd like this to include outdoor work, you could start a petition setting out clearly where you'd like the workplace limit to apply.
